entity.name: title
entity.query: select T.title_id as title_id, T.title_ttype as title_ttype, T.title_views as title_views, T.title_annualviews as title_annualviews, T.title_rating as title_rating, T.title_seriesnum as title_seriesnum, T.title_copyright as title_copyright, T.title_storylen as title_storylen, T.title_translator as title_translator, T.title_title as title_title, T.title_wikipedia as title_wikipedia from titles T

entity.name: title_author
entity.query: select CA.ca_id as ca_id, A.author_marque as author_marque, A.author_canonical as author_canonical, A.author_image as author_image, A.author_imdb as author_imdb, A.author_wikipedia as author_wikipedia from authors A, canonical_author CA where A.author_id = CA.author_id and CA.title_id = ${title.title_id} and CA.ca_status = 1
